products.title: Splash Turquoise Blue Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Their splash turquoise blue perfect fit roller blind is perfect for adding a stylish, modern finish to your home. This light-filtering, dim-out perfect fit blind is the perfect choice whether you are refreshing a tired looking window or moving into a new home. As a simple plain fabric, this saturated blue perfect fit blind is especially great for adding a splash of colour in kitchens, as this fabric is also moisture-resistant.

products.title: Splash Teal Blue Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Their splash range of fabrics are both beautiful and contemporary. Their roller blinds can be manufactured with either white or chrome control chains which ensures you get the desired finish for your room. Also, as their made to measure blinds come with a 5 year guarantee you can rest assured you are investing in a piece that will stand the test of time. Product id: sdb-pfr0679 fabric colour: teal blue material: 100% polyester headrail: drill-free slimline frame with sleek roller casing control type: cordless spring operated energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes splash teal blue perfect fit roller blind in blue.
